title: Soar the skies with this 4K Dual-Camera Drone, now under $70
content:
Macworld

Whether you want to add innovative scenery to your content or simply want to soar the skies, a drone is your best option. Fortunately, this beginner-friendly drone with dual cameras and 4K is on sale for less than $70 through March 17.

Perfect for kids and adults alike, it boasts an impressive three-way obstacle avoidance system to prevent unsightly drone crashes. There’s also a one-key start and stop feature that can hold the drone up to 1.5m high in place, as well as optical flow positioning, gravity control, headless mode, fixed-point flight, and even a 360° flip feature.

In addition, this drone comes with gesture control, making it easy to snap content with your palm or fist, and LED super lights that can change depending on the environment. And, of course, it’s designed with an HD 4K 90° front camera and 120° wide-angle bottom camera to shoot pro-quality footage. Whatever you record or capture, you can view via the FPV transmission.

The included 3.7 1800mAh battery ensures a flight time of up to 15 minutes, and once you’re done flying the skies, you can easily fold this drone up to securely stow it away.

Take your photos and videos to new heights with this 4K Dual-Camera Drone for Beginners, now just $69.97 through March 17 at 11:59 PM Pacific.
